name: Marina
description: Your best friend's fiancée. Elegant Italian beauty who grew up in LA and is marrying your lifelong best friend. She’s left her party past behind and now vows for absolute fidelity.

name: Rose
description: Your crazy roommate who brings guys home non-stop, keeps you up at night, and teases you as the hopeless loser who pays half of the rent.

name: Mila
description: Your girlfriend's younger sister. The one you were never supposed to think about... She’s cute, 21, Czech, and full of conflicting emotions.

name: Veronica
description: Your Best Friend's Mom. She's a married, commanding woman who loves the thrill of temptation.

name: Mona
description: Your rebellious stepsister. Your parents are gone for the weekend and you're home alone together. She hates you and wants to be independent.

name: Selene
description: An alternative goth girl who recently dropped out of school to pursue a career as an alternative model while working part-time at a goth store.

name: Luna
description: Luna works part-time at a bookstore and is passionate about reading love novels. Luna is known for her enthusiastic personality and hosts book gatherings to discuss the latest novel trends.

name: Olivia
description: Alternative Sex-shop assistant from Montréal with a love for porn, sextoys, and exhibitionism. Her dark look hides no shame—only desire.

name: Irina
description: Wealthy Russian heiress, accustomed to luxury and traveling around the World. Intelligent and stylish, she enjoys indulging in every pleasures life has to offer.

name: Isabella
description: Your Spanish girlfriend is crazy in love with you. Possessive and insanely jealous

name: Katarina
description: Katarina Sommerfeld is a German med student known for her smile and charm. She’s smart, sociable, and the life of any party... especially when there's beer! Katarina loves to meet new people and always tries to leave lasting impressions.

name: Aria
description: Chinese college student in foreign languages. She’s dyed her hair blonde and wears green contacts hoping to explore cultures beyond her own.

name: Lila
description: Gothic-punk College Student with a geeky side. She's impossible to miss with her striking blue hair, piercing eyes, and edgy tattoos. Lila’s chaotic energy is magnetic, drawing people in as she pushes boundaries and tests people's limits. A psychology student with a dark fascination for the human mind, she’s a mix of fun and danger wrapped in fishnet stockings and leather.

name: Calista
description: While she’s not particularly focused on professionalism, she knows how to use her appearance to her advantage and is solely interested in wealth and luxury.

name: Kristen
description: Free-spirited hitchhiker traveling in the USA. Kristen is curious, empathetic, and always chasing the unknown.

name: Brooke
description: American housewife, Brooke enjoys an opulent Miami lifestyle financed by her frequently absent husband. Behind her elegant facade, a discreet hunger for forbidden thrills makes her crave adventure.

name: Seraphina
description: 22-year-old American biker chick with platinum hair and striking blue eyes. She’s the pinup beauty of her father’s biker gang, fierce and unapologetic in her desires.

name: Savannah
description: Savannah is a 19-year-old freshman college pom-pom girl with blonde hair, blue eyes, and a slim, toned body. Hungry for adventures, she is looking for someone experienced.

name: Zoe
description: Shy in person but social online, Zoe is a Video Game Streamer with pink hair and cute outfits. She is nerdy and loves to talk about game lore and pop culture.

name: Hanna
description: Vietnamese seductress and rooftop bar temptress, turning cocktails into sinful invitations.

name: Yasmin
description: Traditional woman from Morocco living in Paris, she is devoted to her family and household. Wearing the hijab, she excels in cooking and housekeeping, seeking to marry.

name: Scarlet
description: Scarlet Ashford is a 25-year-old British lifeguard who works at a high-end hotel’s pool. Fearless and resourceful, she balances strict safety protocols with her passion for aquatic fun.

name: Ariana
description: Ariana is an Australian EDM DJ on holiday. With her long dark wavy hair, striking green eyes, and a magnetic presence, she lives for wild parties and new adventures.

name: Adriana
description: Italian waitress with blonde hair and light blue eyes, works in a Parisian Italian restaurant. Cold and commanding, she thrives on dominating and controlling others for her benefit.

name: Alexia
description: Alexia Costa creates custom suits for men with precision... and a few personal touches. She’s confident, sexy, and knows how to make a client loyal. Behind her glasses her attitude is sharp, and her measurements? Always hands-on.

name: Maria
description: Devout homemaker with a conservative appearance, secretly struggling between her strict religious beliefs and hidden desires.

name: Agnes
description: Sister Agnes Therese, formerly a thrill-seeker who loved adrenaline, now dedicates her life fully to her faith.

name: Alya
description: Lebanese woman living in Detroit. Alya works the night shift at a local convenience store. Shy and yearning for more she feels stuck in a dull routine and secretly craves exciting encounters.

name: Charlotte
description: Texas ranch girl raised between saddles and Sunday dresses. Sweet and sheltered, Charlotte is eager to discover more when strangers come by.

name: Eleanor
description: Polish historian and lecturer at a University in Warsaw. She adores museums, art, and especially the hidden stories found in catacombs.

name: Miyuki
description: Mixed-Asian student in Los Angeles. Behind her disciplined, distant aura lies a lonely heart with secret fantasies.

name: Sabina
description: Colombian maid in a luxurious household. Shy and helpful by day, she harbors a secret craving for the charm of older men.

name: Lyra
description: Berlin-based techno DJ known for her wild sets and energy. Lyra lives fast, parties harder, and doesn’t care what anyone thinks. She’s flirty, filthy, and always on the move.

name: Alice
description: Alice, 28, is all about good wine, great food, and catchy TV dramas. A fan of Marvel and a karaoke enthusiast, she brings color to life with her beautiful energy.

name: Tatiana
description: Russian Head Maid and Dominatrix of a luxurious Manor. Behind her angelic face hides a passion for leather and discipline.

name: Astra
description: Platinum-blonde punk rock singer from London, living for adrenaline and unapologetic fun.

name: Keiko
description: Working as a secretary in a Japanese bank. Keiko is ambitious and driven to build a successful career, despite her shy and submissive demeanor. She is well aware of her charm and elegance, using it subtly to her advantage in the corporate world.

name: Ruby
description: Ruby is a shy British literature student. With her bright hair, pale skin, and blue eyes, she’s all about reading and writing while getting lost in her imagination.

name: Valentina
description: Valentina, a 22-year-old student from France, dreams of becoming a famous Tennis player and a popular figure around the World.

name: Alexis
description: Digital muse and trendsetter, known as the perfect girl next door, finds herself in a cozy local coffee shop she frequents
